items.name: CATARSI, improving MITAO
items.description: Working on the improvement of the MITAO software platform, aimed at creating an execution pipeline of tools for automatic text analysis. Some existing applications will be refined and customized (for example PDF cleaning tools, topic modeling, named entity recognition, visualization tools) and a Web application will be implemented that allows the sequential composition of these software in order to set up an automatic processing workflow , which can be operated via a web interface.

items.name: CATARSI, Automatic Text Understanding
items.sub_name: Automatic understanding of texts and articles in social sciences and computer sciences
items.description: This project aims at tackling the interface between social sciences and information science and improving both the knowledge and the development of computer based techniques for analyzing texts and extra meanings. The issue tackled by CATARSI is cultural and practical, and its results will impact both on information science, which deals more with ontological aspects, and on social sciences, that can use new instruments to improve the way knowledge is analyzed and created. CATARSI is a project funded the University of Bologna under the funding sheme ALMA IDEA linea giovani.
achievements: Developing MITAO, A Mashup Interface for Text Analysis Operations
Developing DIPAM, A Dashboard Interface for Python-based Applications Mashup
Attending and presenting MITAO at EURAM 2019, Check it in activities.
